Race.SpecificTitle: Chief of Police -- City of Slidell
Town of Pearl River -- Elected Officials Term Limit - TC
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Pearl River, State of Louisiana enact an ordinance limiting the number of terms of office which any elected official of the Town of Pearl River may serve to two consecutive terms in the same office to be effective with the term beginning on January 1, 2019?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. No. 6 -- 10 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 6 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall St. Tammany Fire Protection District No. 6 of the Parish of St. Tammany, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a ten (10) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $262,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District, including emergency equipment and supplies and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes and paying charges for fire hydrant rentals and service?
